question:
Which of the following inequalities is equivalent to \(-\frac{a}{3b} < c\) for all non-zero values of a, b, and c?
Indicate
all
such inequalities.
A. \(\frac{a}{b} > -3c\)
B. \(\frac{-a}{3}  < bc\)
C. \(a > -3bc\)

Hide
